posts.title: Armatrix Automations Private Limited
posts.description: The Company's status is Active It's a company limited by shares with an authorized capital of Rs 10.00 Lakh and a paid-up capital of Rs 1.00 Lakh, as per the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) records.
